# Double Click VC [![Download][download-badge]][download-link] [![PayPal][paypal-badge]][paypal-link]
Requires you to double click voice channels to join them instead of single clicking.

[paypal-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/PayPal-%23003087.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,
[paypal-link]: https://paypal.me/eternal404



[download-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-%233a71c1.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,
[download-link]: https://discord-modifications.github.io/downloader/?plugin=DoubleClickVC
